Disney is pivoting towards experiential spending with its theme parks and streaming services, aligning with evolving consumer preferences.
Netflix is well-positioned in the digital services space, benefiting from increased consumer spending on streaming content post-pandemic.
United Airlines is adapting to the resurgence in travel demand as consumer behavior shifts towards experiential spending, particularly in travel.
Lockheed Martin is positioned to benefit from increased defense spending and focus on domestic manufacturing amid geopolitical tensions.
